parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.12

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the class name of currently used magazine on specified turret. Use turret path [-1] for driver's turret. Note that a turret is not loaded until unit enters it, so this command will return "".

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''currentMagazineDetailTurret''' [turret path]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [turret path]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_magazineDetail = MBT_Kuma [[currentMagazineDetailTurret]] [0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[currentMagazineTurret]], [[currentWeaponTurret]], [[addWeaponTurret]], [[removeWeaponTurret]], [[turretLocal]]
</value></part></template></root>
